function.name: run_check
function.description: Checks whether it is possible to create the chart.

is_possible.description: Whether it is possible to create the chart

function.name: create_bar_chart
function.description: Creates a web component for a bar chart

column_category.description: Name of column on the X axis.

column_values.description: Name of column on the Y axis.

aggregation.description: Aggregation type to be used in the chart.

xlabel.description: The label used for the x axis.

ylabel.description: The label used for the y axis.

colorspace.description: The selected colorspace to display on the chart.

show_background.description: Whether or not to show or hide the background on the chart.

function.name: create_line_chart
function.description: Creates a web component for a line chart

column_category.description: Name of column on the X axis.

column_values.description: Name of column on the Y axis.

aggregation.description: Aggregation type to be used in the chart.

xlabel.description: The label used for the x axis.

ylabel.description: The label used for the y axis.

colorspace.description: The selected colorspace to display the markers on the chart.

show_zoom.description: Whether or not to show or hide the data zoom feature on the chart.

line_color.description: Line color in hex to use for the line on the chart.

line_type.description: Line type to use for the line on the chart.

line_style.description: Line style to use for the line on the chart.

function.name: create_scatter_chart
function.description: Creates a web component for a scatter chart

column_xaxis.description: Name of column on the X axis.

column_yaxis.description: Name of column on the Y axis.

xlabel.description: The label used for the x axis.

ylabel.description: The label used for the y axis.

colorspace.description: The selected colorspace to display on the chart.

show_zoom.description: Whether or not to show or hide the data zoom feature on the chart.

function.name: create_pie_chart
function.description: Creates a web component for a pie chart

column_category.description: Name of column on the X axis.

column_values.description: Name of column on the Y axis.

aggregation.description: Aggregation type to be used in the chart.

colorspace.description: The selected colorspace to display on the chart.
